about_the_game:
Targets is an adventure shooter that takes place in an idyllic world. Test your marksman skills as you explore and discover the targets' malevolent plans.

The first world will let you play at your own pace and style as your skills improve. But things will only get harder as you journey through mystic portals.
Embark on a mission to free other worlds from the clutches of the targets' false promises and malevolent designs. The battle against the invaders has only just begun.

Pursue the enigmatic targets across vast realms, as the mysteries of the portal unfold before your eyes. Will you succumb to the allure of immortality, or find solace in cherishing the ephemeral beauty that graces your path?

Features

  • open world puzzles,
  • multiple ways to solve the same situation,
  • Unreal Engine stylized graphics
  • no intro screens, no 10 minutes of splash screens before the game starts
  • mouse+keyboard supported. controller supported

Update 2.0

A mysterious portal has opened. Welcome to level 2.
Auto-saves removed: the game now uses a checkpoint system instead.
Ammo limits introduced.
Level1: 40 coins to be found. Sprint hability now unlocks at 25 coins (reduced from 30 coins).

Controls:

Keyboard + Mouse / Usb Controller

Toggle Help: Keyboard "H"

Pause game: Keyboard "P"

Change mouse sensitivity: use numbers numbers 1 (lower) to 4 (higher) any time in-game

Enable/Disable Vsync: Keyboard "V" - use this if if notice excessive screen tearing during gameplay

Enable/Disable Motion Blur: Keyboard "B"
detailed_description:
Targets is an adventure shooter that takes place in an idyllic world. Test your marksman skills as you explore and discover the targets' malevolent plans.

The first world will let you play at your own pace and style as your skills improve. But things will only get harder as you journey through mystic portals.
Embark on a mission to free other worlds from the clutches of the targets' false promises and malevolent designs. The battle against the invaders has only just begun.

Pursue the enigmatic targets across vast realms, as the mysteries of the portal unfold before your eyes. Will you succumb to the allure of immortality, or find solace in cherishing the ephemeral beauty that graces your path?

Features

  • open world puzzles,
  • multiple ways to solve the same situation,
  • Unreal Engine stylized graphics
  • no intro screens, no 10 minutes of splash screens before the game starts
  • mouse+keyboard supported. controller supported

Update 2.0

A mysterious portal has opened. Welcome to level 2.
Auto-saves removed: the game now uses a checkpoint system instead.
Ammo limits introduced.
Level1: 40 coins to be found. Sprint hability now unlocks at 25 coins (reduced from 30 coins).

Controls:

Keyboard + Mouse / Usb Controller

Toggle Help: Keyboard "H"

Pause game: Keyboard "P"

Change mouse sensitivity: use numbers numbers 1 (lower) to 4 (higher) any time in-game

Enable/Disable Vsync: Keyboard "V" - use this if if notice excessive screen tearing during gameplay

Enable/Disable Motion Blur: Keyboard "B"
legal_notice:
Created with Unreal Engine 4, using Unreal Engine's first person template and Unreal Marketplace content.

Epilepsy Warning:
Videogames contain visual effects and rapid on-screen movements that may trigger seizures or other adverse reactions in individuals prone to photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or anyone in your family has a history of epilepsy or seizures, please consult a medical professional before playing.

Healthy Break Recommendation:
While playing "Targets" can be an immersive and thrilling experience, it's important to prioritize your well-being. We strongly recommend taking regular breaks during extended gaming sessions to avoid eye strain, fatigue, and other potential health issues. Remember to stretch, hydrate, and engage in physical activity to maintain a balanced lifestyle. Your health and enjoyment of the game go hand in hand.
name: Targets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore the map. Shoot the Targets.
